questions.author: Caleb Stevenson
questions.title: How do you deploy an Ember app on Firebase?
questions.body: Hello! I ran into a couple of issues trying to deploy my ember web app using firebase. Wondering if anyone has successfully done so and is willing to give me a few tips. Thanks!
